item.author: Abolish ICE Denver

item.title: Solidarity with these abolitionist freedom fighters!
item.content:encoded:
Abolish ICE Denver

Solidarity with these abolitionist freedom fighters!

+10Sheriff Gordon Smith - Bradford County Sheriff

Three Arrested for Resisting, Trespassing and Criminal Mischief at Florida State Prison

At approximately 4:10 pm on today‚Äôs date, Bradford County Sh...eriff Deputies, Starke Police Officers and Florida Highway Patrol Troopers responded to a call for assistance from Florida State Prison. They advised numerous vehicles and people were trespassing on the prison grounds and disrupting the inmate population. They were shouting on bullhorns, shooting what is believed to be fireworks and damaging prison property. Upon arrival of deputies they discovered the prison grounds had been vandalized in excess of $1000.00 and the people refused to leave.

Law enforcement observed three individuals who appeared to be inciting the illegal behavior and attempted to place them under arrest. All three unsuccessfully resisted and were arrested. Two were taken directly to the Bradford County Jail while the third one was taken to a local emergency room for treatment of a non-life-threatening injury. They are being held until first appearance scheduled for Monday morning. All three are being charged with Resisting an Officer Without Violence, Trespassing After Warning and Felony Criminal Mischief.

Sheriff Gordon Smith stated: ‚ÄúBradford County has no qualms with anyone wanting to peacefully protest, however we will act quickly and decisively when the line is crossed into disorder and criminal behavior.‚Äù

Arrested: Peter Tsolkas (12/28/80), Dami Feral (6/2/77), and Danielle Chanzes (1/30/93)

State officials included prisoners in the second group to get the vaccine, heeding calls from the ACLU and other advocates.

item.title: "The Wall Street Journal first reported in February that...
item.content:encoded:
Abolish ICE Denver

"The Wall Street Journal first reported in February that the Trump administration was buying access to such data through a company named Venntel that was selling access to a database to DHS, ICE and CBP.

‚ÄúThe agencies‚Äô purchase raise serious concerns that they are avoiding Fourth Amendment protection for cell phone location information by paying for access instead of obtaining a warrant,‚Äù the ACLU wrote in the lawsuit.

In 2018, the Supreme Court held in Carpenter vs. Unite...d States that collecting significant quantities of historical data location from cellphones is a search under the Fourth Amendment and requires a warrant [...]

The ACLU said in the suit the records ‚Äúwould contribute significantly to the public‚Äôs understanding‚Äù of how the agencies use ‚Äúinvasive surveillance technology both at the border and within American communities, and whether they are complying with constitutional and legal limitations on unreasonable searches.‚Äù

See MoreThe American Civil Liberties Union (ACLU) is ramping up efforts to obtain records of the Trump administration‚Äôs reported purchase of cellphone data to track locations

thehill.com

ACLU sues DHS for records on purchased cell phone data to track immigrants

The American Civil Liberties Union (ACLU) is ramping up efforts to obtain records of the Trump administration‚Äôs reported purchase of cellphone data to track locationsThe American Civil Liberties Union (ACLU) is ramping up efforts to obtain records of the Trump administration‚Äôs reported purchase of cellphone data to track locations

item.title: ICE investigators issued a subpoena this week demanding BuzzFeed...
item.content:encoded:
Abolish ICE Denver

ICE investigators issued a subpoena this week demanding BuzzFeed News identify its sources ‚Äî an extraordinary attempt by the government to interfere with a news outlet acting under the protections of the First Amendment.

"This is embarrassing for ICE. I think it is a weak effort to intimidate the press,‚Äù said John Sandweg, former acting director of the agency. ‚ÄúWhen you‚Äôre trying to intimidate the press, you cross a line. It is something that the agency should never do.‚Äù

‚ÄúThis is embarrassing for ICE,‚Äù the former acting director of the agency said. ‚ÄúWhen you‚Äôre trying to intimidate the press, you cross a line.‚Äù

buzzfeednews.com

ICE Is Trying To Force BuzzFeed News To Divulge Its Sources

‚ÄúThis is embarrassing for ICE,‚Äù the former acting director of the agency said. ‚ÄúWhen you‚Äôre trying to intimidate the press, you cross a line.‚Äù‚ÄúThis is embarrassing for ICE,‚Äù the former acting director of the agency said. ‚ÄúWhen you‚Äôre trying to intimidate the press, you cross a line.‚Äù

item.title: Yes! District Judge Nicholas Garaufis just ruled for the full...
item.content:encoded:
Abolish ICE Denver

Yes! District Judge Nicholas Garaufis just ruled for the full restoration of #DACA that opens the program for new applicants for the first time since 2017. This is a step forward in the fight for freedom but our communities need permanent protections that ensure the safety and security of ALL community members. #FreedomTogether https://cbsn.ws/3qxdUuO

One million undocumented immigrant teens and young adults who qualify for DACA on paper could apply for the Obama-era protections from deportation following the court order.

cbsnews.com

Judge orders restoration of DACA, opening immigration program to new applicants for first time since 2017

One million undocumented immigrant teens and young adults who qualify for DACA on paper could apply for the Obama-era protections from deportation following the court order.One million undocumented immigrant teens and young adults who qualify for DACA on paper could apply for the Obama-era protections from deportation following the court order.

item.title: Be ready to join the conversation on two separate segments of...
item.content:encoded:
Abolish ICE Denver

Be ready to join the conversation on two separate segments of Mayor Mike Live, Friday afternoon at 3:00 pm. The first segment will be will be with Bryant Palmer, Marketing Director for the Stanley Market Place who will be discussing holiday programs and events at the Stanley Marketplace and all of the safety precautions that they've taken. The second segment will be with Ricardo Gambetta, manager of Aurora's Office of International & Immigrant Affairs, who will be discussi...ng the city's 10 year plan to bring international business to Aurora and to help our diverse immigrant community to be integrated into our local economy and to help prepare them for citizenship. You can post your questions on these, or any other topics, on the city's facebook page now or during the show and the guests and I will answer as many questions as possible during the live streaming.
https://www.facebook.com/auroragov/live/ and you can watch live at AuroraTV.org

See MoreThe Aurora TV Channel

auroratv.org

Aurora TV

The Aurora TV ChannelThe Aurora TV Channel

item.title: "This is a blatant violation of the 14th & 5th...
item.content:encoded:
Abolish ICE Denver

"This is a blatant violation of the 14th & 5th Amendment "equal protection under law" clause. They're still people and it is literally the state's responsibility to protect them.

This is another case of liberal classism and selective morality. You don't get to deem one life more valuable than another."

Gov. Jared Polis‚Äô comments Tuesday run counter to the ethical framework in a plan drafted by his administration. Colorado officials say the plan will be revised next week.

item.title: Did you know that in Denver, no more than TWO unrelated people...
item.content:encoded:
Abolish ICE Denver

Did you know that in Denver, no more than TWO unrelated people can live in the same household? That means you can't have more than one roommate to help pay your mortgage. Times are already tough, let's make it easier to live in Denver, not harder.

Join us in supporting Denver's proposed group living ordinance that will allow:
- up to FIVE unrelated people to live in the same household if you so choose.
- allow residential care facilities in more places ...
- the creation of congregate living spaces that could be used for teacher housing and more!

Sign up for this community meeting on Thursday from 5:30-7:30pm by clicking this link: https://denvergov-org.zoom.us/‚Ä¶/r‚Ä¶/WN_fZlzw6rKQfCuabG8H_yEGw

Not able to attend but want to support anyway? Sign our letter of support here: https://forms.gle/GCpEuFFxbkYbXtoE6

¬øSab√≠as que en Denver, solo DOS personas no relacionadas pueden vivir en el mismo hogar? Eso significa que no pueden tener m√°s de un compa√±ero de cuarto o inquilino para ayudar a pagar su hipoteca. Los tiempos ya son lo suficientemente dif√≠ciles, hagamos m√°s f√°cil vivir en Denver, no m√°s dif√≠cil.

Acomp√°√±enos en apoyar la ordenanza de vida grupal propuesta por Denver que permitir√°:
- hasta CINCO personas no relacionadas para vivir en el mismo hogar si as√≠ lo desean
- instalaciones de cuidado residencial en m√°s lugares
- la creaci√≥n de espacios de vida congregados que podr√≠an ser utilizados para la vivienda de los maestros y m√°s!

Reg√≠strese para esta reuni√≥n de la comunidad el jueves de 5:30-7:30pm haciendo clic en este enlace: https://denvergov-org.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN fZlzw6rKQfCuabG8H yEGw

item.title: Happy #GivingTuesday! Sanctuary4All is an immigrant-led group...
item.content:encoded:
Abolish ICE Denver

Happy #GivingTuesday! Sanctuary4All is an immigrant-led group dedicated to protecting families and improving the lives of Colorado immigrants of all backgrounds. Founded in 2019 by longtime immigration activist Jeanette Vizguerra, Sanctuary4All works at the intersection of mutual aid and political action. By connecting directly impacted families with caring members of our community we will lift each other up and build a movement to affect positive systemic change for the masses. You can support our mission by purchasing pupusas from Yessenia at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co committing to a monthly donation via Patreon at Patreon.com/Sanctuary4All or donating to sanctuary-4-all on Venmo. üíï‚ú®
